data.title: Butter Olive Oil
data.meta_description: This creamy olive oil is naturally infused with the rich flavor of butter.   Use when baking, with breads, vegetables, meat, rice, and pasta - and with popcorn!
data.text:
| Ashley 28-02-2023 03:06

This is now a staple in my house. I use it anytime I’d use butter when cooking.

| Amanda 08-02-2023 20:15

Love it!

| Brenda Shaw 08-02-2023 03:42

This is one of my favorite oils. I love to make popcorn with olive oil but always added butter after…now I just use my butter olive oil! It is awesome. I also use my butter olive oil when making eggs on my griddle. It adds just the right amount of flavor. This is a go to oil for me and I always keep it on hand!

| Marsha Hinthorn 06-02-2023 06:38

I keep my spritzer of butter infused oil by the stove, and I use it daily. It has a great flavor and makes a wonderful gift!

| Becky Ehredt 06-02-2023 01:59

This is one of my favorite olive oils. I add it to veggies and it makes them taste great. When I buy it again I'm going to try it on popcorn

| Shannon 05-02-2023 23:01

The butter olive oil is one of our faves - we love making popcorn with it!

| Lisa Callis 05-02-2023 02:26

This is my absolute favorite. I use it daily; morning eggs and whatever I’m cooking for dinner-

Especially the salmon in combo with the lemon oil. I use it to flavor my popcorn, too!

| Patti Jamerson 03-02-2023 17:26

Love this olive oil, it’s great on veggies, for popping popcorn and so many other things! Great staple to have in your kitchen!

| Julie 03-02-2023 16:55

Love using the butter olive oil in place of butter!!

| kekkles 13-02-2022 05:39

This is SO much easier (and more tasty) to add onto popcorn than butter. No extra dish, no butter explosions in the microwave - just pop the top and drizzle on. Love this stuff.

| BKH 13-02-2022 05:16

Love this butter oil oil, adds just the right amount of flavor to eggs, fish & all other recipes, yummy.

| Rhonda 12-02-2022 22:17

If you haven’t made homemade popcorn with this you’re missing out! A little salt and Parmesan cheese on top and you won’t want microwave popcorn again!

| Melissa 03-02-2022 15:31

Love using this to Sauté, brush on bread before baking, make eggs…. Yum!!

| Diana Nealey 03-02-2022 11:49

Olive Bin Butter Olive Oil is my go to product for popcorn. Delicious.

| Suzan Kiesewetter 03-02-2022 02:27

Love the flavor it gives potatoes, veggies. Like to cook our eggs with it. Always add a little when cooking veggie burgers or turkey burgers. Guess it is my go to oil.

| Lisa 03-02-2022 01:12

Butter olive oil is my absolute favorite. I use it alll the time. I love to make popcorn with it too.

| Brenda Hoschele 06-05-2021 19:12

I use this on everything!

| Brenda Hoschele 06-05-2021 19:11

I use this on just about everything!

| Sheri 05-05-2021 23:34

Pop your popcorn in this. Add black pepper to your popped corn & it’s a pretty healthy & very yummy snack!

| Brenda 04-05-2021 10:44

This is my favorite oil to pop popcorn with! It adds flavor and is healthier than the other oils I used to use. Love this oil!
